name: Vigilance on Talos V
storyline: The Xenos have captured your daughter and enslaved her along with thousands of others. After years of grueling training with the best mercenaries in the universe you take on your mission with a vengeance. The most dangerous planet, TALOS V, awaits you.
summary: Essentially a Super Metroid clone, but for DOS. The player assumes the role of Killian Jaraad, a space mercenary searching for his kidnapped daughter.
